name: Talk_EyeBoy
_source: speak;EyeBoy;Hmm...interesting.|These medical supplies contain traces of healing magic.|Primitive, but functional.
speak;Eirika;You found those supplies?|How thoughtful of you!
speak;EyeBoy;Don't misunderstand. I was analyzing their magical properties.|The fact that they can heal people is merely...coincidental.
speak;Eirika;But you still brought them to help the wounded.
speak;EyeBoy;I needed test subjects for my magical analysis.|Living subjects provide better data than corpses.
speak;Eirika;Your methods are questionable, but your heart seems to be in the right place.
speak;EyeBoy;This manual labor is beneath my intellectual capabilities.|Yet it does provide opportunities for field research...
speak;Eirika;You've been working so hard to help, {v:EyeBoyName}.
speak;EyeBoy;I'm studying the villagers' social cooperation patterns.|Their gratitude responses are... adequate data.
speak;Eirika;Is that really the only reason you're helping?
speak;EyeBoy;...Perhaps I've also developed a hypothesis that their wellbeing correlates with my research success.
speak;EyeBoy;Water... an excellent conductor for magical energies.|This bridge reconstruction provides valuable research data.
speak;Eirika;You've been helping with the bridge repairs?
speak;EyeBoy;I've been analyzing the structural integrity through magical means.|Far more precise than your crude physical methods.
speak;Eirika;But you're still contributing to the work.
speak;EyeBoy;My contributions are intellectually superior.|Though I admit... seeing the bridge function does provide... satisfaction.
speak;Eirika;You do care about helping people, don't you?
speak;EyeBoy;The ocean's magical currents are remarkably complex.|Tidal forces affect mana flow in fascinating ways.
speak;EyeBoy;"Like" is an emotional response. I find it intellectually stimulating.|The salt water's interaction with magical energies is... captivating.
speak;Eirika;You sound almost peaceful when you talk about it.
speak;EyeBoy;Peace is simply the absence of distracting variables.|Though I concede this environment does enhance my research capabilities.
speak;Eirika;Maybe there's beauty in knowledge too.
speak;EyeBoy;My visual range far exceeds yours.|I've cataloged seventeen potential threat vectors you've missed.
speak;EyeBoy;I'm conducting perimeter surveillance for research purposes.|If my observations happen to protect you, that's merely a byproduct.
speak;Eirika;Your research seems to help us quite often.
speak;EyeBoy;Correlation, not causation.|Though I admit maintaining living research subjects requires... protective measures.
speak;Eirika;Thank you for watching over us, {v:EyeBoyName}.
speak;EyeBoy;The residual dark energy here is... overwhelming.|My magical sensitivity makes this place nearly unbearable.
speak;EyeBoy;I'm experiencing magical backlash from the corrupted energies.|Most... enlightening, if painful.
speak;Eirika;The evil here affects you more than us, doesn't it?
speak;EyeBoy;My superior magical awareness comes with... disadvantages.|But the knowledge gained from this suffering is invaluable.
speak;Eirika;Please be careful. We need you safe.
speak;EyeBoy;These bones contain fascinating necromantic residue.|Each specimen tells a story of magical corruption and decay.
speak;EyeBoy;Death is simply another form of magical transformation.|Though I admit... these particular deaths seem unnecessarily tragic.
speak;Eirika;Do you feel sorry for them?
speak;EyeBoy;I feel... academically disappointed by the waste of potential knowledge.|They could have contributed so much more to magical understanding.
speak;Eirika;That's a form of mourning, isn't it?
speak;EyeBoy;My floating locomotion makes me immune to their predictable arrow trajectories.|Elementary tactical advantages.
speak;Eirika;Your flying really helped us get through that safely!
speak;EyeBoy;Obviously. My superior mobility is a tactical asset you should utilize more effectively.
speak;EyeBoy;Gratitude is unnecessary.|Though I admit... your acknowledgment of my contributions is... adequate.
speak;Eirika;You like being appreciated, don't you?
speak;EyeBoy;I'm analyzing magical signatures beneath this debris.|There are... interesting discoveries hidden here.
speak;EyeBoy;Several items of marginal magical significance.|I suppose they might also be... useful for your mundane purposes.
speak;Eirika;You always seem to find exactly what we need.
speak;EyeBoy;My research priorities simply happen to align with your survival requirements.|Pure coincidence.
speak;Eirika;I'm starting to think you care more than you let on.
speak;EyeBoy;I'm monitoring magical disturbances during your tactical discussion.|Several interesting anomalies detected.
speak;EyeBoy;I'm conducting multi-dimensional surveillance research.|If my observations prevent interruptions to your planning, that's merely efficient.
speak;Eirika;You want our strategies to succeed, don't you?
speak;EyeBoy;Successful campaigns provide more opportunities for field research.|Failed expeditions yield no data.
speak;Eirika;Thank you for looking out for us, {v:EyeBoyName}.
speak;EyeBoy;This castle's magical foundations are remarkably sophisticated.|Centuries of accumulated mystical energy permeate these stones.
speak;Eirika;This is my home, {v:EyeBoyName}. What do you think?
speak;EyeBoy;From a research perspective, it's quite impressive.|Your ancestors clearly understood magical architecture.
speak;Eirika;Do you feel at home here too?
speak;EyeBoy;"Home" is a sentimental concept.|Though I admit... this environment is conducive to my studies.|Perhaps... adequate for extended research.
speak;Eirika;I'm glad you feel welcome here.
speak;EyeBoy;The corruption in Lyon... it's absolutely fascinating from a magical perspective.|Such power, such waste...
speak;EyeBoy;...Yes.|I knew him too.|His magical potential was remarkable.|To see it perverted like this... it's academically offensive.
speak;Eirika;You miss him too, don't you?
speak;EyeBoy;I miss... the research we could have conducted together.|He understood magical theory better than most.|That loss is... regrettable.
speak;Eirika;Thank you for remembering him kindly.
speak;EyeBoy;This desert heat is interfering with my magical sensitivity.|Most annoying for research purposes.
speak;Eirika;The climate is harsh on you too, {v:EyeBoyName}?
speak;EyeBoy;My magical essence requires optimal conditions.|This environment is... suboptimal for intellectual pursuits.
speak;Eirika;Here, stay in the shade with us.
speak;EyeBoy;A logical suggestion.|Maintaining peak research capability requires appropriate environmental controls.
speak;Eirika;We all need to take care of each other.
speak;EyeBoy;I was entering a meditative state to process accumulated research data.|Your approach interrupted my analysis.
speak;EyeBoy;Rest is for inferior minds.|I was conducting deep theoretical analysis of our mission parameters.
speak;EyeBoy;That this journey's end approaches.|The magical patterns suggest... significant revelations ahead.
speak;Eirika;You sound almost ominous when you say that.
speak;Eirika;{v:EyeBoyName}... we've learned so much together.|You've shown me that knowledge and compassion can coexist.
speak;EyeBoy;Your magical education has been... adequate.|Though you still lack proper theoretical foundation.
speak;Eirika;I've learned more from traveling with you than from any book.
speak;EyeBoy;Field research is indeed superior to pure theory.|And you've provided... interesting case studies in human behavior.
speak;Eirika;Is that your way of saying you'll miss me?
speak;EyeBoy;...I anticipate that future research will be less... comprehensive without your participation.
speak;Ephraim;So you're the... floating eye creature Eirika mentioned.|Strange ally.
speak;EyeBoy;I am {v:EyeBoyName}, and I am conducting extensive magical research.|Your sister has been an adequate research assistant.
speak;Ephraim;Research assistant? That's... one way to put it.|What exactly are you researching?
speak;EyeBoy;Combat magic applications, tactical spell deployment, battlefield thaumaturgy...|Your military strategies provide excellent case studies.
speak;Ephraim;At least you're analyzing something useful.|Carry on, then.
speak;EyeBoy;Obviously I shall continue. I require no permission for intellectual pursuits.
speak;EyeBoy;The ocean's magical currents are interfering with my long-range detection capabilities.|Highly inconvenient for surveillance research.
speak;Ephraim;Can you still keep watch effectively?
speak;EyeBoy;My capabilities remain superior to your primitive senses.|Though I admit the maritime environment poses... challenges.
speak;Ephraim;Just do your best. We're all adapting to new conditions.
speak;EyeBoy;I do not merely do my "best."|I conduct optimal analysis given current parameters.|The distinction is important.
speak;EyeBoy;The ship's motion is disrupting my magical equilibrium.|Most annoying for research purposes.
speak;Ephraim;Seasick, {v:EyeBoyName}? I didn't expect that from a floating creature.
speak;EyeBoy;It is not "sickness." It is environmental disorientation affecting my mystical sensitivity.|The distinction is crucial.
speak;Ephraim;Whatever you call it, you look miserable.
speak;EyeBoy;I am experiencing suboptimal research conditions.|Misery is an emotional response I do not... acknowledge.
speak;Ephraim;Try focusing on the horizon.|Sometimes that helps.
speak;EyeBoy;Excellent. Solid ground restores optimal magical sensitivity.|My research capabilities are fully restored.
speak;EyeBoy;I am operating at peak analytical efficiency.|The maritime environment was suboptimal for intellectual pursuits.
speak;Ephraim;Good to have you back at full strength.
speak;EyeBoy;"Full strength" implies previous weakness.|I was merely... temporarily constrained by environmental factors.
speak;EyeBoy;This burial ground contains fascinating necromantic residue.|The magical implications of mass death are quite enlightening.
speak;Ephraim;Does death affect you differently than it affects us?
speak;EyeBoy;Death is simply a transition of magical energies.|Though I admit... unnecessary death represents a loss of potential knowledge.
speak;Ephraim;You sound almost respectful when you talk about it.
speak;EyeBoy;I respect the research opportunities that death provides.|The emotional aspects are... less relevant to my studies.
speak;Ephraim;But you still understand the gravity of it.
speak;EyeBoy;I am conducting structural analysis of this damaged architecture.|Several magically significant artifacts detected beneath the rubble.
speak;Ephraim;Finding anything useful in all that debris?
speak;EyeBoy;Multiple items of strategic and research value.|My analytical methods far exceed crude physical excavation.
speak;Ephraim;Your magical sight is definitely an advantage.
speak;EyeBoy;Obviously.|My capabilities are intellectually superior to brute force methods.
speak;Ephraim;Just keep finding what we need, {v:EyeBoyName}.
speak;EyeBoy;I am monitoring multiple magical frequencies for potential threats.|My surveillance capabilities far exceed conventional methods.
speak;EyeBoy;I am conducting comprehensive perimeter analysis.|If my research happens to protect your tactical discussions, that is merely efficient.
speak;Ephraim;Your research always seems to help us out.
speak;EyeBoy;Successful military operations provide superior research opportunities.|Failed campaigns yield no data.
speak;Ephraim;Keep up the good work, then.
speak;EyeBoy;This fortress exhibits remarkable magical architecture.|The defensive enchantments are quite sophisticated.
speak;Ephraim;This is Renais Castle, my ancestral home. What's your assessment?
speak;EyeBoy;From a strategic perspective, the magical fortifications are impressive.|Your ancestors clearly understood mystical warfare.
speak;EyeBoy;I provide only accurate analysis.|Though I admit... this environment is conducive to advanced research.
speak;Ephraim;Glad you approve of our family castle.
speak;EyeBoy;The magical corruption in Lyon is absolutely fascinating.|Such power, such tragic misuse of potential...
speak;Ephraim;Lyon was our childhood friend, {v:EyeBoyName}. Show some respect.
speak;EyeBoy;I knew him as well.|His theoretical understanding was exceptional.|To see such intellectual capacity perverted... it's academically wasteful.
speak;Ephraim;That's... actually a touching way to remember him.
speak;EyeBoy;I mourn the loss of potential knowledge.|He could have contributed so much to magical understanding.|Instead... this.
speak;Ephraim;We'll honor his memory by stopping this corruption.
speak;EyeBoy;This desert climate is severely impacting my magical sensitivity.|Highly suboptimal conditions for research.
speak;Ephraim;The heat getting to you too, {v:EyeBoyName}?
speak;EyeBoy;My mystical essence requires appropriate environmental parameters.|This heat interferes with optimal analytical function.
speak;Ephraim;Stay with the group in the shade. We'll get through this together.
speak;EyeBoy;A logical tactical decision.|Maintaining research capability requires environmental management.
speak;EyeBoy;I was conducting deep analysis of accumulated battlefield data.|Your interruption disrupted my theoretical calculations.
speak;EyeBoy;I do not "rest."|I was processing complex magical patterns and strategic implications.
speak;Ephraim;And what did your analysis conclude?
speak;EyeBoy;That we approach a critical nexus of magical forces.|The final confrontation will be... theoretically significant.
speak;Ephraim;Hopefully we're ready for whatever's coming.
speak;Ephraim;{v:EyeBoyName}... you've been studying this conflict from the beginning.|What's your final assessment?
speak;EyeBoy;From a tactical perspective, your leadership has provided excellent research data.|The strategic applications have been... illuminating.
speak;Ephraim;That's high praise from someone as critical as you.
speak;EyeBoy;I provide only accurate analysis.|Though I admit... this expedition has exceeded my research expectations.
speak;EyeBoy;I anticipate the ultimate magical confrontation will provide unprecedented research opportunities.|Most... satisfactory.
